Action.author: danielhardman
Action.body: Misty, can you please include a link to your doc so I can test it?

Action.author: danielhardman
Action.body: I know I am a bottleneck on this ticket. I am struggling with it. The writing is fine, but I am really reluctant to release these instructions to alpha stewards, because the way we are telling them to accomplish certain tasks is broken. This is a problem with our code, not the doc. I am tempted to fix the code and then revise the doc, rather than releasing the doc as-is.

Action.author: danielhardman
Action.body: Need support for DIDs before the instructions we give to stewards can be optimal.

Action.author: danielhardman
Action.body: Need support for DIDs before the instructions we give to stewards can be optimal.

Action.author: danielhardman
Action.body: Need correct terminology in CLI before doc can be released.
